Detailed Description

Transformation matrix.

Class is a container for 4x4 matrix stored in column-major order. Storage is compatible with OpenGL, thus OpenGL functions could literally work on instances of this class. Initially matrix is an identity matrix.

Warning:
for current requirements of 2d engine, methods of this class are using 2x2 "rotation" minor and 1x2 "translation" block. Methods of this class can not be used for general purpose calculus!

math::VectorPtr< 2 > & gpx::phy::TransformationMatrix::mult ( math::VectorPtr< 2 > &  vector  )  const

Multiply matrix by 2d vector.

Since matrix is 4x4, 2d vector (x, y) is mapped to 4d (x, y, 0.0, 1.0) vector in homogeneous coordinates.

Parameters:
vector vector to be multiplied.
Returns:
vector after multiplication.
